response.original_title: A Cut Above: The Legacy of New York City Basketball and the ACC
response.overview: Legends of ACC basketball share tales from past ACC Tournaments and from their days playing NYC street ball; history of the tournament, roots of the league on "Tobacco Road." In preparation for the 2017 New York Life ACC Basketball Tournament in Brooklyn, Raycom Sports presents A Cut Above, basketball stories from a New York City barbershop.
response.title: A Cut Above: The Legacy of New York City Basketball and the ACC
